org.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN group_users ON users.id = group_users.group_id WHERE users.type = "$1" AND group_users.user_id = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN group_users ON users.id = group_users.group_id WHERE users.type = "$1" AND group_users.user_id = "$2" LIMIT 1
